title: Activision Blizzard and the Push for Meaningful Change and Accountability | The Escapist Show
description:
This week on The Escapist Show, Jack plays a mobile game, Nick plays some Halo and then we discuss the current situation with Activision Blizzard and how we as consumers can help push for change and accountability.

title: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (Zero Punctuation Re-Release)
description:
**Re-Release** The Zero Punctuation episode of Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands was never officially released by The Escapist on YouTube in a standalone format. Thanks to the community request, now it has. Enjoy!
